title: Genefire
description: ***** WINNER of Firebird Book Awards 2023 - in 3 Categories (New Author, Genetics, Time Travel)********** WINNER Literary Titan Book Awards 2023 ***** near-future SciFi novel crossing space and time. In a future where genetic engineering is becoming the norm, even the simplest mistakes could be devastating.Sometimes it feels as though the world will end if you don’t finish your PhD. For Larry Milton, it’s true.Larry has discovered a dire warning from the future about Earth’s destruction — written in the DNA of a young girl. With the destruction of the planet at stake, and no one believing him, he goes to extraordinary lengths to help the messenger from the future save the world… and try to finish his PhD at the same time.
author: James Flanagan
